channel.title: CVE Feed for Tribe29 -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tribe29 -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-1768|2024-08-02T05:57:25.231Z -- tribe29 -- checkmk
item.description: Inappropriate error handling in Tribe29 Checkmk <= 2.1.0p25, <= 2.0.0p34, <= 2.2.0b3 (beta), and all versions of Checkmk 1.6.0 causes the symmetric encryption of agent data to fail silently and transmit the data in plaintext in certain configurations.

item.title: CVE-2023-22309|2024-08-02T10:07:06.322Z -- tribe29 -- checkmk%20appliance
item.description: Reflective Cross-Site-Scripting in Webconf in Tribe29 Checkmk Appliance before 1.6.4.

item.title: CVE-2023-31207|2024-08-02T14:45:26.020Z -- tribe29 -- checkmk
item.description: Transmission of credentials within query parameters in Checkmk <= 2.1.0p26, <= 2.0.0p35, and <= 2.2.0b6 (beta) may cause the automation user's secret to be written to the site Apache access log.

item.title: CVE-2023-22288|2024-08-02T10:07:05.977Z -- tribe29 -- checkmk
item.description: HTML Email Injection in Tribe29 Checkmk <=2.1.0p23; <=2.0.0p34, and all versions of Checkmk 1.6.0 allows an authenticated attacker to inject malicious HTML into Emails

item.title: CVE-2023-22359|2024-08-02T10:07:06.470Z -- tribe29 -- checkmk
item.description: User enumeration in Checkmk <=2.2.0p4 allows an authenticated attacker to enumerate usernames.

item.title: CVE-2023-0284|2024-08-02T05:02:44.148Z -- tribe29 -- checkmk
item.description: Improper Input Validation of LDAP user IDs in Tribe29 Checkmk allows attackers that can control LDAP user IDs to manipulate files on the server. Checkmk <= 2.1.0p19, Checkmk <= 2.0.0p32, and all versions of Checkmk 1.6.0 (EOL) are affected.

item.title: CVE-2023-2020|2024-08-02T06:12:19.531Z -- tribe29 -- checkmk
item.description: Insufficient permission checks in the REST API in Tribe29 Checkmk <= 2.1.0p27 and <= 2.2.0b4 (beta) allow unauthorized users to schedule downtimes for any host.

item.title: CVE-2023-22294|2024-08-02T10:07:06.102Z -- tribe29 -- checkmk%20appliance
item.description: Privilege escalation in Tribe29 Checkmk Appliance before 1.6.4 allows authenticated site users to escalate privileges via incorrectly set permissions.

item.title: CVE-2023-22307|2024-08-02T10:07:05.998Z -- tribe29 -- checkmk%20appliance
item.description: Sensitive data exposure in Webconf in Tribe29 Checkmk Appliance before 1.6.4 allows local attacker to retrieve passwords via reading log files.

item.title: CVE-2023-22318|2024-08-02T10:07:06.219Z -- tribe29 -- checkmk%20appliance
item.description: Denial of service in Webconf in Tribe29 Checkmk Appliance before 1.6.5.
